content: this is a very simple pattern worked in the round the yarn i have used is discontinued but any dk weight cotton/mix would work just as well if you wanted the coaster larger then you could use a larger hook a double magic loop/magic_ring is executed in the same way as a standard magic loop/magic_ring you just loop the yarn around your fingers twice instead of once here is a video tutorial for a standing single_crochet https //www youtube com/watch v=8msveiid2uy please feel free to message me if you have any problems enjoy
